name: Cardiology Consultation
description: Expert consultation for cardiac issues including chest pain, palpitations, and heart rhythm problems. Our experienced cardiologist will perform a thorough examination.

name: Gastroenterology Consultation
description: Comprehensive digestive system consultation for stomach pain, acid reflux, IBS, and other gastrointestinal concerns.

name: Complete Blood Analysis
description: Comprehensive blood test including CBC, metabolic panel, and vitamin levels. Results available within 24 hours.

name: General Health Checkup
description: Routine health examination including vital signs, physical exam, and general health assessment.

name: Dermatology Consultation
description: Skin condition evaluation and treatment for acne, rashes, moles, and other dermatological concerns.
